Guard Stan:
Have you heard about the Enchanted Valley just east of our town? There are many unusual types of game there. That is why hunters originally built a village there. Nowadays many of the villagers are not hunters, and the Enchanted Vally is home to many different sorts of people and occupations.
Although nearby the Town of Oren, it is actually in teh Town of Aden... And just as well, as there are rumors that the Lord of Aden is having a hard time controlling the Valley...
